description.zh: 先進的交通系統地圖顯示了台南城市交通的計畫和現有的交通路線。
description.en: Advanced transportation system mapping showing planned and existing transit routes for Tainan's urban mobility.

media.title: 公民科技助攻，第一張前瞻軌道視覺化地圖誕生

description.zh: 洪水風險評估圖確定了暴雨期間易被淹沒的區域。
description.en: Flood risk assessment mapping identifying areas susceptible to inundation during heavy rainfall events.

media.title: 數字會說話 黑客公民自製台南淹水潛勢地圖分析觀察

title.zh: 台南市里鄰編組及調整地圖
title.en: 台南市里鄰編組及調整地圖

description.zh: 追蹤台南市社區劃分與重組的行政邊界管理系統。
description.en: Administrative boundary management system tracking neighborhood divisions and reorganization in Tainan City.

title.zh: 台南市違反勞動基準法事業單位地圖
title.en: 台南市違反勞動基準法事業單位地圖

description.zh: 勞動法違規追蹤系統將記錄違反就業標準的企業映射到地圖上。
description.en: Labor law violation tracking system mapping businesses with recorded infractions of employment standards.

description.zh: 促進台南市包容性遊樂場發展和無障礙公園設計的社區倡議平台。
description.en: Community advocacy platform promoting inclusive playground development and accessible park design in Tainan City.

title.zh: 台南市優先拆除違建地圖
title.en: 台南市優先拆除違建地圖

description.zh: 非法建築監控系統追蹤優先拆除和城市規劃執法的建築物。
description.en: Illegal construction monitoring system tracking priority buildings for demolition and urban planning enforcement.

description.zh: 農業用地工廠追蹤系統監控全國農業地區的非法工業發展。
description.en: Agricultural land factory tracking system monitoring illegal industrial development on farming areas nationwide.

title.zh: 台灣強震高風險區域人口統計
title.en: 台灣強震高風險區域人口統計

description.zh: 地震風險評估將地震危險區與人口密度資料結合，用於災害防備規劃。
description.en: Seismic risk assessment combining earthquake hazard zones with population density data for disaster preparedness planning.

description.zh: 地質災害測繪，辨識易發生山崩和自然災害的環境敏感區域。
description.en: Geological hazard mapping identifying environmentally sensitive areas prone to landslides and natural disasters.

description.zh: 地方治理儀表板為村莊管理提供社區層級統計資料和行政資訊。
description.en: Local governance dashboard providing community-level statistics and administrative information for village management.

title.zh: 測站空氣品質季平均統計圖
title.en: 測站空氣品質季平均統計圖

description.zh: 空氣品質監測可視化顯示了政府測量站的季節性污染趨勢。
description.en: Air quality monitoring visualization showing seasonal pollution trends from government measurement stations.

title.zh: 台南溼地與漁電共生地圖
title.en: 台南溼地與漁電共生地圖

description.zh: 生態和再生能源地圖顯示濕地保護區和水產養殖太陽能裝置。
description.en: Ecological and renewable energy mapping showing wetland conservation areas and aquaculture solar installations.

title.zh: 病媒蚊監控採樣數據地圖
title.en: 病媒蚊監控採樣數據地圖

description.zh: 媒介監測資料映射蚊蟲族群監測和疾病預防抽樣結果。
description.en: Vector surveillance data mapping mosquito population monitoring and disease prevention sampling results.

description.zh: 早期 COVID-19 追蹤平台繪製了疫情爆發初期的冠狀病毒病例和大流行應對措施。
description.en: Early COVID-19 tracking platform mapping coronavirus cases and pandemic response during the initial outbreak.

description.zh: 人口流動可視化追蹤台灣各地區的人口流動模式和人口流動。
description.en: Population movement visualization tracking human mobility patterns and demographic flows across Taiwan's regions.

description.zh: 市議會透明平台監控台南市議員活動、投票記錄和公共問責。
description.en: Municipal council transparency platform monitoring Tainan City councilor activities, voting records, and public accountability.

description.zh: 用於國際旅行規劃的全球 COVID-19 旅行限制和邊境管制政策追蹤系統。
description.en: Global COVID-19 travel restrictions and border control policy tracking system for international travel planning.

description.zh: 2022年議員選舉結果和候選人資訊平台提供全面的選舉數據分析。
description.en: 2022 councilor election results and candidate information platform providing comprehensive electoral data analysis.

description.zh: 城市林業和綠地測繪平台促進植樹造林和環境保護措施。
description.en: Urban forestry and green space mapping platform promoting tree planting and environmental conservation initiatives.

description.zh: 區域排水系統監測平台追蹤台南市的水流狀況和洪水管理。
description.en: Regional drainage system monitoring platform tracking water flow conditions and flood management in Tainan City.

title.zh: 社團 / 財團法人資料檢索
title.en: 社團 / 財團法人資料檢索

description.zh: 非營利組織資料庫提供有關台灣基金會和民間社會團體的可搜尋資訊。
description.en: Non-profit organization database providing searchable information on foundations and civil society groups in Taiwan.

description.zh: 展示台灣各地景點、文化遺址和休閒目的地的旅遊平台。
description.en: Travel and tourism platform showcasing local attractions, cultural sites, and recreational destinations across Taiwan.

title.zh: 臺南市110學年度公立幼兒園地圖
title.en: 臺南市110學年度公立幼兒園地圖

description.zh: 2021 學年台南公立幼兒園招生地圖，包括位置和容量資訊。
description.en: Academic year 2021 public kindergarten enrollment map for Tainan City with location and capacity information.

description.zh: 交通事故報告系統提供全國範圍內的即時碰撞數據和道路安全資訊。
description.en: Traffic accident reporting system providing real-time collision data and road safety information nationwide.

description.zh: 交通事故地圖系統可視化碰撞熱點和道路安全模式，以改善交通規劃。
description.en: Traffic accident mapping system visualizing collision hotspots and road safety patterns to improve transportation planning.

media.title: 【地圖新鮮事】台北哪段路車禍最多？瑞竣科技推虎口地圖，幫你避開危險路段

title.zh: 台南狹小巷道火災搶救不易巷道地圖
title.en: 台南狹小巷道火災搶救不易巷道地圖

description.zh: 消防救援可及性地圖示出了台南市緊急救援車輛面臨通行困難的狹窄小巷。
description.en: Fire rescue accessibility mapping identifying narrow alleys in Tainan where emergency vehicles face access challenges.

description.zh: 宗教場所地圖平台記錄了台灣不同社區的寺廟、教堂和精神機構。
description.en: Religious sites mapping platform documenting temples, churches, and spiritual institutions across Taiwan's diverse communities.

description.zh: 全面呈現全台補習班及課後計畫地圖，協助家長尋找教育資源。
description.en: Comprehensive mapping of cram schools and after-school programs across Taiwan, helping parents find educational resources.

description.zh: 綜合藥品和藥物資料庫，提供台灣詳細的藥品資訊和安全資料。
description.en: Comprehensive drug and medication database providing detailed pharmaceutical information and safety data for Taiwan.

media.title: 藥要看 你專屬的藥品守門員

description.zh: 記錄校園內樹木和綠地的互動地圖，促進教育中的環保意識。
description.en: Interactive map documenting trees and green spaces within school campuses, promoting environmental awareness in education.

description.zh: 市民服務請求追蹤系統，可視化台南市 1999 年熱線報告和市政服務回應。
description.en: Citizen service request tracking system visualizing 1999 hotline reports and municipal service responses in Tainan City.

description.zh: 2021 年公投結果的詳細村級地圖，提供民主參與模式的詳細分析。
description.en: Detailed village-level mapping of 2021 referendum results, providing granular analysis of democratic participation patterns.

title.zh: 公路交通量調查統計地圖
title.en: 公路交通量調查統計地圖

description.zh: 道路交通量分析和視覺化工具使用政府交通調查資料進行基礎設施規劃。
description.en: Roads traffic volume analysis and visualization tool using government transportation survey data for infrastructure planning.
